entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
